title: Kerning
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015911/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015911/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Kerning**

Kerning involves closing up or opening out letter pairs where the letter shape results in uneven [letter spacing](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015911/http:/typophile.com/wiki/letter%20spacing).
